video_url.title: Video Url
video_url.description: The URL of the driving template video providing motion, facial expressions, and lip movement reference. Max duration: 30 seconds. Format: mp4, mov or webm. Resolution: between 200x200 and 2048x1440. Supports full face and body driving.

trim_first_second.title: Trim First Second
trim_first_second.description: Whether to crop the first second of the output video. The output has a 1-second transition at the beginning; enable this to remove it.

image_url.title: Image Url
image_url.description: The URL of the reference image to animate. Supports real people, animation, pets, etc. Format: jpeg, jpg or png. Max size: 4.7 MB. Resolution: between 480x480 and 1920x1080 (larger images will be proportionally reduced).

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
